analysis: The current project appears to be a static website with a focus on interactive elements and animations. The theme is intended to be related to black holes, with a request for bulk animated objects, slides, and pages. The existing files suggest a foundation for a cosmic-themed website, but the CSS and JavaScript need to be updated to fully realize the black hole theme with animations and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a full dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the SVG data URLs are properly formatted and include Egyptian-themed patterns.

Update the JavaScript file to include functionality for bulk animated objects, slides, and pages. Ensure all event handlers are properly implemented and that the mobile menu toggle functionality is user-friendly with smooth transitions.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
